message: When did channel 10 turn into a Homo Haven???

""""God...your a smart dude..wow!"""" (I probably just seem that way relative to you.) My real point is I'm saying you should listen to the guys who ARE smart dudes... the PhD's in the field. (I asked you where the """"real scientists"""" you mentioned work.) I mean, isn't it odd that you can't find a single actual scientific organization that agrees with you? Surely you can find at least ONE. Otherwise, you're saying every scientific organization on Earth disagrees with you on this, a science issue. Despite your """"real scientists that says the ice mass is growing"""" comment. (Still waiting for your evidence on that one!)

Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!
